name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-oriented QA Engineer with 9+ years of experience in manual and automated testing for web and mobile applications. Proficient in **Playwright**, **Selenium**, and test case management tools like **Qase** and **TestRail**. Exceptional skills in accessibility testing, issue tracking with **Jira**, and utilizing **Agile methodology** to enhance testing processes. Committed to delivering high-quality software through meticulous web application and mobile application testing. Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset enable effective teamwork and project success. Dedicated to continuous learning and improvement in QA practices.

experience.responsibilities:
Conduct comprehensive **manual QA testing** on web and mobile applications to ensure functionality and accessibility standards are met.
Utilize **Playwright** and **Selenium** for **automation testing**, effectively reducing testing time by **30%**.
Develop and manage detailed test cases in **Qase** and **TestRail**, successfully leading to a **20%** increase in test coverage.
Employ **issue tracking tools** like **Jira** to document and track bugs, facilitating a smooth workflow within the **Agile methodology** framework.
Execute **accessibility testing** to enhance user experience across diverse platforms, achieving compliance levels of **95%**.
Collaborate with development teams in troubleshooting issues and ensuring clear communication, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
Participate in sprint planning and review sessions, contributing to the iterative enhancement of testing protocols and processes.
Implement best practices in **test case management**, ensuring all testing activities align with project goals and deadlines.

Demonstrated strong communication skills while supporting team collaboration and enhancing overall project efficiency.

Conducted **manual QA testing** for web and mobile applications, ensuring high-quality standards were met and increasing defect detection by **20%**.
Utilized **Selenium** and **Playwright** for **automation testing**, reducing regression testing time by **35%** and enhancing release cycle efficiency.
Managed **test case management** using **Qase** and **TestRail**, streamlining the QA process and improving traceability of testing efforts.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an **Agile** environment, fostering **team collaboration** and improving product delivery timelines by **15%**.
Performed **accessibility testing** to ensure application compliance with WCAG standards, enhancing user experience for individuals with disabilities.
Leveraged **Jira** for **issue tracking**, effectively communicating bugs and enhancements to development teams, leading to a **40%** reduction in critical post-release issues.
Participated in continuous learning initiatives to stay updated with the latest QA methodologies and tools, contributing to the overall knowledge of the QA team.
Conducted thorough code reviews and training sessions with junior QA testers, improving overall team performance and communication skills across the board.

Executed manual QA testing for web and mobile applications, ensuring compliance with accessibility standards, thus enhancing user satisfaction by **15%**.
Developed and executed comprehensive test cases using **Playwright** and **Selenium**, increasing bug detection rate by **30%** prior to production.
Utilized Qase and TestRail for effective test case management and documentation, improving tracking accuracy and reporting efficiency.
Participated in Agile methodology practices, contributing to daily standups and retrospectives, strengthening team collaboration.
Engaged in continuous learning to stay updated with the latest QA techniques, enhancing overall testing strategies within the team.
Performed rigorous testing on web applications, identifying and reporting issues through **Jira**, leading to quicker resolution times.
Collaborated closely with development teams to ensure an agile feedback loop, which led to a **25%** reduction in defect rework instances.
Conducted thorough accessibility testing to assure compliance with WCAG standards, fostering inclusivity in the applications.
Documented testing results and provided detailed reports to stakeholders, significantly improving communication and transparency amongst teams.
